Impact of CompetitionEach civilization scores 1 culture per level of each of its military units and arenas. Orange scores 16 culture Green scores 7 culture Grey scores 9 culture
Impact of ColoniesEach civilization scores 3 culture per colony. Orange scores 6 culture Green scores 3 culture
